original_title: Fuel prices revised with effect from Wednesday (29) night
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Fuel prices will be revised with effect from midnight on Wednesday (29), announced Minister Kanchana Wijesekera during a media briefing.
Petrol 92 will be reduced by Rs. 60/- (New Price: Rs. 340/-)
Lanka Auto Diesel will be reduced by Rs. 80/- (New Price: Rs. 325/-)
Petrol 95 will be reduced by Rs. 135/- (New Price: Rs. 375/-)
Super Diesel will be reduced by Rs. 45/- (New Price: Rs. 465/-)
Bus fares revised with effect from Thursday (30); Authorities release Full List of revised fares
Snr. DIG & several top cops from North Western province transferred to Colombo
Crypto Currency NOT recognized in Sri Lanka, and there are no regulatory safeguards – CBSL
